typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HealthData
HealthData derive(concern = case(tSymptoms == 'Yes', 'Yes',tSeenDoc == 'Yes', 'Yes', tRisks == 'Yes', 'Yes', tTemperature > 38.0, 'Yes','No')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(tID!='')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		Concern as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['tID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tID,
		tWorkplaceID,
		tReadDate,
		tReadTime,
		tTemperature,
		tSymptoms,
		tRisks,
		tSeenDoc,
		tCreateDateTime,
		Concern = concern
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
